name: Gosund
0:
”Alexa, turn on the bedroom light”
”Alexa, turn off the bedroom light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
If you have any problems, please contact us at shenzhencuco@gmail.com.

Gosund offers the most comprehensive voice controlled smart home experience. Control your home lighting and other devices hands free. Just say it, Gosund will obey. 

Here’s a step by step guide:
1. Download our "Gosund" app in app market, then register an account (or log in directly if you already have an account);
2. Configure our devices in "Gosund" app and change appropriate name for your devices;
3. Enable "Gosund" skill on Alexa app, you'll be navigated to the login page, follow the instructions on the page to complete linking;
4. Tell Echo "Alexa, discover my devices". Wait for Echo to say "Search complete";
5. Now all setup is finished. You can enjoy the voice control on your home devices like these:
Alexa, turn on the bedroom light.
Alexa, turn off the bedroom light.
Alexa, set the bedroom light to 50%.
Alexa, brighten the bedroom light to 50%.
Alexa, dim the bedroom light to 50%.
Alexa, set the bedroom light to green.
Alexa, turn on the plug.
Alexa, turn off the plug.
